Yonkers.Bronx High School for Law and Community:
Bronx High School for Law and Community Service is a small school in the New York City borough of The Bronx. It is located within Roosevelt Educational Campus, across the street from Fordham University.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 416 students and 25.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 16.1:1.
